fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.editor.menu
Class CustomAnimation

java.lang.Object
  android.view.animation.Animation
      fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.editor.menu.CustomAnimation
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollapseAnimation, ExpandAnimation
public abstract class CustomAnimation
extends android.view.animation.Animation
implements android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener

The Abstract Class CustomAnimation extends Animation and provides values and a structure to handle collapse and expand animations

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
